home.title: The Stars of the Rock
home.subtitle: Your haven of peace on the French Riviera

content.quote: The beauty of a place is revealed in the caress of light, the silence it inhabits, and the emotion it evokes.
content.description1: Imagine a place where luxury meets authenticity, where every detail has been designed for your well-being. Our estate, nestled just 5 minutes from Monaco, offers the perfect balance between absolute tranquility and privileged access to the most beautiful beaches, prestigious boutiques, and events on the French Riviera.
content.description2: Immerse yourself in a 350 m¬≤ space spread over two floors, where five private suites welcome you with exceptional bedding. A discreet guesthouse, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, is available to accommodate your guests in an idyllic setting.
content.description3: Be charmed by our infinity pool blending into the marine horizon, and discover our rooftop offering a breathtaking panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.
content.description4: Between intimacy, elegance, and art of living, our estate is the perfect setting for an unforgettable getaway on the Riviera.

villa.title: The Stars of the Rock Villa
villa.description: A jewel facing the sea, where every detail invites contemplation. Upon waking, the murmur of the waves and the azure view will compose your first memory of the day. The clean volumes, open to the outside, offer a subtle sensory experience, combining refinement and authentic Riviera charm.

features.subtitle: Recently completed at the beginning of the year, this luxury villa, never rented before, is ready to offer you unforgettable moments, with family or friends.

events.description: Discover our selection of must-see places and events to visit during your stay in our exceptional villa.

fortAntoine.title: Evening walk at Fort Antoine
fortAntoine.description: Open-air theater located on the heights of Monaco, Fort Antoine hosts intimate artistic performances under the stars. Enjoy a show in this historic place facing the sea, in a unique atmosphere combining culture, heritage, and nighttime magic.

monacoGP.title: Monaco Grand Prix
monacoGP.description: Experience the legendary race from our villa or with our VIP access to the best stands on the circuit.

casino.title: Monte-Carlo Casino
casino.description: Try your luck at the legendary casino where James Bond is a regular. Belle √âpoque architecture and hushed ambiance.

oceanographic.title: Oceanographic Museum
oceanographic.description: Over 6,000 marine species, giant aquariums, and interactive exhibitions in a majestic building overlooking the sea.

rally.title: Monte-Carlo Historic Rally
rally.description: Admire vintage cars traveling the winding roads of the hinterland during this prestigious competition.

customsPath.title: Customs Officers' Path
customsPath.description: Preserved coastal walk offering spectacular views of the sea and secret coves of the French Riviera.

ezeVillage.title: √àze Village
ezeVillage.description: Perched at 429m altitude, this medieval village offers a 360¬∞ view of the French Riviera and is home to the famous Exotic Garden.

littleAfrica.title: Beaulieu's Little Africa
littleAfrica.description: Secret botanical garden housing rare exotic species and an intimate beach away from the crowds.

corbusier.title: Le Corbusier Path
corbusier.description: Architectural route along the sea revealing iconic villas, including Eileen Gray's famous Villa E-1027.

garnier.title: Monte-Carlo's Garnier Opera
garnier.description: Architectural masterpiece usually closed to the public, but accessible during exclusive guided tours that we can organize.

blueGulf.title: Blue Gulf
blueGulf.description: Secret cove accessible only by a discreet path or by sea, offering crystal-clear waters and rare tranquility.

terms.title: General terms
terms.content:
General Terms ‚Äì Villa The Stars of the Rock
The rental of the villa The Stars of the Rock, property of the company SAS ALPHA GROUP, is subject to these general terms, which the tenant fully and unreservedly accepts when signing the rental contract.

1. Occupancy capacity
The villa is designed for a maximum of 10 people (including children). It is strictly forbidden to exceed this capacity, under penalty of immediate termination of the stay, without refund.

2. Parties, nuisances, and tranquility
It is strictly forbidden to organize parties, evenings, or events at the villa.
No noise nuisance is tolerated between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM to respect the neighborhood's tranquility.
Any breach of this rule may result in the intervention of law enforcement and immediate eviction of the tenant without refund.

3. Animals
Pets are not allowed on the property, without exception, unless prior written authorization from SAS ALPHA GROUP. Any breach will result in immediate termination of the contract, solely at the tenant's fault.

4. Use of premises
The tenant agrees to use the villa peacefully, exclusively for vacation purposes. They agree to respect the house rules, the premises, the equipment, and the neighborhood.

5. Access and security
The keys, badges, and access means provided are strictly personal and must be returned upon departure. Any loss will result in the invoicing of replacement. The tenant is required to close doors, gates, and alarms when leaving the villa.

6. Cleanliness and inventory
The villa is handed over clean and in perfect condition. The tenant must return it in a similar state. Additional cleaning fees may be applied in case of non-compliance.

7. Image rights and intellectual property
All photos, videos, plans, and visuals representing the villa The Stars of the Rock are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
They are not free of rights, nor reusable, nor exploitable without prior written authorization. Any infringement will result in civil and/or criminal proceedings.

8. Surveillance and security of premises
For security reasons, some exterior accesses may be under video surveillance, in accordance with current legislation. No cameras are installed in private or interior spaces.

9. Liability and insurance
The tenant is responsible for damages, losses, or degradation caused to the villa or its equipment.
It is strongly recommended to take out vacation insurance covering their rental civil liability.

10. Acceptance
The signature of the rental contract constitutes full acceptance of these general terms, the general sales conditions, as well as the house rules.

sales.title: General Sales Conditions
sales.content:
General Sales Conditions ‚Äì The Stars of the Rock
1. Booking
The booking of the villa The Stars of the Rock, property of the company SAS ALPHA GROUP, is considered firm and definitive only after:
receipt of a 50% deposit of the total amount of the stay,
and the signing of a rental contract, established for each booking.
The rental contract must necessarily be drafted and signed by both parties before any entry into the premises.
The balance of the stay must be paid in full no later than 60 days before the arrival date. In case of non-payment by this deadline, the booking may be canceled by operation of law without refund of the deposit.

2. Security deposit
A security deposit of ‚Ç¨5,000 is required upon arrival. It will be refunded within a maximum period of 15 days after departure, less any damages, breaches of the rules, or additional costs.

3. Cancellation
Any cancellation by the client entails the following conditions:
More than 90 days before arrival: refund of 70% of the deposit paid,
Between 90 and 60 days: refund of 50% of the deposit,
Between 60 and 30 days: no refund of the deposit,
Less than 30 days before arrival: no refund, the total amount of the stay remains due.
There is no right of withdrawal.

4. Arrival and departure
Arrival: from 4:00 PM,
Departure: by 10:00 AM at the latest.
Any unauthorized overtime will result in additional charges.

5. Capacity and use
Maximum number of people allowed: 10 people, including children.
It is strictly forbidden to organize parties, events, or receptions in the villa.
No noise nuisance is tolerated between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM.
Pets are not accepted, except with prior written agreement.
Any breach of these rules may result in immediate termination of the contract solely at the client's fault, without possible refund.

6. House rules
The client agrees to respect the house rules provided upon arrival. This document is an integral part of the contract. Any serious breach (damages, disrespect to the neighborhood, non-compliance with prohibitions) will result in the loss of the security deposit and may lead to legal action.

7. Additional services
Additional services (private chef, butler, concierge, etc.) must be booked at least 15 days before arrival. Any modification or cancellation of these services must be made at least 7 days in advance; otherwise, the amount remains due.

8. Image rights and intellectual property
All photographs, videos, and visuals representing the villa The Stars of the Rock are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
Any reproduction, publication, or use without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.

9. Liability
The client is responsible for damages caused by themselves or their companions. They are required to take out vacation insurance. A certificate may be required upon arrival.

10. Disputes
In case of dispute, the parties will seek an amicable solution. Failing this, the competent courts are those of the location of the villa.
